mapper.select: SELECT A.EQUIPMENT_BUSINESS_PLACE, B.CHILD_TBL_TYPE AS EQUIPMENT_BUSINESS_PLACE_NAME, A.EQUIPMENT_INFO_CODE, A.EQUIPMENT_INFO_NAME, A.EQUIPMENT_INFO_ABR, A.EQUIPMENT_HEIGHT, A.EQUIPMENT_WIDTH, A.EQUIPMENT_DEPTH, A.EQUIPMENT_SERIAL_NUM, A.EQUIPMENT_TYPE, E.CHILD_TBL_TYPE AS EQUIPMENT_TYPE_NAME, A.EQUIPMENT_RECEIVED_D, A.EQUIPMENT_MODEL_YEAR, A.EQUIPMENT_MANUFACTURER, A.EQUIPMENT_STATUS, C.CHILD_TBL_TYPE AS EQUIPMENT_STATUS_NAME, A.EQUIPMENT_INFO_RMARK, A.EQUIPMENT_USE_STATUS, A.EQUIPMENT_MODIFY_D, D.USER_NAME EQUIPMENT_MODIFIER FROM Equipment_Info_tbl A INNER JOIN ( select * from DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE=2 ) B ON A.EQUIPMENT_BUSINESS_PLACE = B.CHILD_TBL_NO INNER JOIN ( select * from DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE=12 ) C ON A.EQUIPMENT_STATUS = C.CHILD_TBL_NO INNER JOIN User_Info_tbl D ON A.EQUIPMENT_MODIFIER = D.USER_CODE INNER JOIN ( select * from DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE=43 ) E ON A.Equipment_Type = E.CHILD_TBL_NO

SELECT A.EQUIPMENT_BUSINESS_PLACE, B.CHILD_TBL_TYPE AS EQUIPMENT_BUSINESS_PLACE_NAME, A.EQUIPMENT_INFO_CODE, A.EQUIPMENT_INFO_NAME, A.EQUIPMENT_INFO_ABR, A.EQUIPMENT_HEIGHT, A.EQUIPMENT_WIDTH, A.EQUIPMENT_DEPTH, A.EQUIPMENT_SERIAL_NUM, A.EQUIPMENT_TYPE, E.CHILD_TBL_TYPE AS EQUIPMENT_TYPE_NAME, A.EQUIPMENT_RECEIVED_D, A.EQUIPMENT_MODEL_YEAR, A.EQUIPMENT_MANUFACTURER, A.EQUIPMENT_STATUS, C.CHILD_TBL_TYPE AS EQUIPMENT_STATUS_NAME, A.EQUIPMENT_INFO_RMARK, A.EQUIPMENT_USE_STATUS, A.EQUIPMENT_MODIFY_D, D.USER_NAME EQUIPMENT_MODIFIER FROM Equipment_Info_tbl A INNER JOIN ( select * from DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE=2 ) B ON A.EQUIPMENT_BUSINESS_PLACE = B.CHILD_TBL_NO INNER JOIN ( select * from DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE=12 ) C ON A.EQUIPMENT_STATUS = C.CHILD_TBL_NO INNER JOIN User_Info_tbl D ON A.EQUIPMENT_MODIFIER = D.USER_CODE INNER JOIN ( select * from DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE=43 ) E ON A.Equipment_Type = E.CHILD_TBL_NO where A.EQUIPMENT_INFO_CODE = #{machineCode}

select eit.Equipment_info_Code workOrder_EquipCode, eit.Equipment_info_Name workOrder_EquipName, eit.Equipment_info_ABR, eit.Equipment_Type, wott.WorkOrder_ONo, wott.WorkOrder_ItemCode, pit.Product_Item_Name WorkOrder_ItemName, wott.WorkOrder_RegisterTime, wott.WorkOrder_Remark, wott.WorkOrder_WorkStatus, dt2.Child_TBL_Type WorkOrder_WorkStatus_Name, wott.WorkOrder_Use_Status from Equipment_Info_tbl eit inner join ( select * from DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE=43 ) dt on eit.Equipment_Type = dt.CHILD_TBL_NO left outer JOIN (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT max(WorkOrder_ONo) AS max_WorkOrder_ONo, max(WorkOrder_RegisterTime) AS max_time from WorkOrder_tbl GROUP BY workOrder_EquipCode ) wt INNER JOIN WorkOrder_tbl wot ON wot.WorkOrder_ONo = wt.max_WorkOrder_ONo AND wot.WorkOrder_RegisterTime = wt.max_time ) wott ON eit.Equipment_Info_Code = wott.WorkOrder_EquipCode left outer join DTL_TBL dt2 ON wott.WorkOrder_WorkStatus = dt2.Child_TBL_No left outer join Product_Info_tbl pit ON wott.WorkOrder_ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code
